DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy Magnetic EEG/ECG-Guided Resonance Therapy ( MeRT ) subject Autism Spectrum Disorder ( ASD ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Chart Review Evaluate Safety Efficacy MeRT Subjects With ASD
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective chart review 200 consecutive chart subject age 2-20 year old see Brain Treatment Center 2010 2015 . The review design evaluate safety efficacy Magnetic Electroencephalogram/Electrocardiogram ( EEG/ECG ) -Guided Resonance Therapy ( MeRT ) subject Autism Spectrum Disorder ( ASD ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Must complete baseline EEG Brain Treatment Center ( BTC ) 2 . Age 2 20 year old initial visit 3 . Must diagnosis ASD accord prevail standard time ( i.e. , Diagnostic Statistical ManualIV ( DSMIV ) ) ( ASD Group ) 4 . Must receive Magnetic EEG/ECGGuided Resonance Therapy ( MeRT ) ( 5 ) session ( ASD Group ) 5 . Clinically significant abnormality clinically significant unstable medical condition treatment Investigator 's judgment may may limit interpretation result .
DOC.keyword: Autism , chart review , transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS )
